div.p:
Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta apud montem Castrj vltimo
die mensis Octobris Anno quo supra

The said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' ser Johne' ruthirfurd'
forspekar that William Inuor / hes wrangit in the leuyng of the aldirmanis
seruice and that he sall serue him for this helyear for the for the quhilkis he was in
ane amerciament of the court et cetera ande' atour he was chargit to set souerte that
he suld' serue his bait for this helyear

The said day it was deliuerit be the forsaid assis' that Androw Johnsoun'
hes wrangit in the ressetting of William Inuor in his bait fra the
aldirmanis bait for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera

The said day it was deliuerit be the forsaid' assis' that thomas bryane
Androw Johnesone William Inuor' robert Wat was conuict' for the brakin
of the commone ordinence and statutis maid obefor in the selling of thar fische
ar thai present the merkat for thar singlar awaill aganis the comone proffit of
the towne and for the selling of thar fische in gret and for the selling'
of thar fische at the schoir at thai present the merkat for the quhilkis Ilk'
ane of thaim was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene' tenta In pretorio eisudem tercio die
mensis Nouembris Anno quo supra

The said day It henry hind' was conuikit be ane suorne assis' ser Johne'
ruthirfurd' forspkar for the strublance of Johnne of cusny skippar of the
hoy baitht in word' and deid' and the said skippar for strublance of the said
henry in word' And the prouocacioun' was fundin in the said henry hynd
ffor the quhilkis Ilkane' of thame was in amerciament of the court and till amend' as
law will and forbeir in tyme tocum

The said' day It was statut and ordanit be the aldirman and counsale present for the
tyme that ale the baxtaris of this burghe' sale haue sufficient Stuf bakyne
bred' of quhet cleyne fresche weilbakin the laif weyande xxiiij vnce
for ij d' quhile thai' be fordir avisit vndir the pane of brekin of commone
ordinance Ande gif it salhappin ony of the saide baxtaris to falye and brek
the said' pas' he sale pay' xl s' vnforgevin to the haly blud' licht

The said' day Androw gordone thomas buchan gilbert tulidef Jonhne buchane Donald'
baxtar Symsone baxtar thomas straloche
was conuict' be ane suorne assis' Androw Cullan forspekar for brekin of the pas' et cetera And'
for the bakin of vnsufficient Stuf et cetera and for want of bred' to serue the towne
et cetera for the quhilkis Ilkan of tham was in Amerciamentis of the court et cetera and gif ony of tham
falyeis in ony poynt befor writin and beis conuict' tharof sale pay xl s' to Sanct
nicoles werk vnforgevin

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quarto die mensis
Nouembris anno et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day comperit Willeame turing of foverne and followit William
stall pewterar' for vj li' of tyne and a half quhilk suld' haue ben' tua
placis quhilk Willeame comperit and allegeit he had deliuerit the said tua
placis contenand' the j wecht to the said lardis seruandis one his behalf
quhilk was referrit to the said Williamis aitht and he deponit that he deliuerit
the said stuff to the said lardis seruandis one his behalf

The said day Willeame thomsone alias ydill grantit him awand'
to Johnne low smytht xxxij yeir schillingis of the rest of ane mair Some'
for the pament of ane soyr' hors boucht fra the said Johnne' quhilkis
the baillies chargeit him to pay within terme of lawe

head.add: the personis chosin for Johne' findoris fee

div.p:
The said day thir personis folloving was diuisit and ordanit be the
consaill to convene prouid' and see how the money aving to Johnne findour mastir
Wricht for the completing of that kirk werk salbe gottin that is to say gilbert
menyis prouost ser Johnne ruthirfurd Johnne of cullane Androu cullan'
Johnne' of mar James colisone and alexander gray

The said day the Prouest baillies and Counsall grantit ser Willeam'
Wricht chaplane his met and drink in the dietis among the gud men
of the townn' of the quhilkis walter strathachin was In to giddir with ane
burges frelie to be maid' at the devis' will of the said ser William and will of the
towne' for his gude seruice to be doune in Syngin in the parris' kirk
as ale his pouer' as efferis

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eisudem viij die nouembris anno
quo supra

The saide day Duncan Wandy was conuict' in defalt of presence as he that was
warnit and nocht comperit

The said' day the wif of Syme flessour the wif of patry rate meg Dovny
and the wif of Sandy lammyntone was conuict be that avne tounge graunt
for brekin of the wecht in candill' makin et cetera

Curi balliuorum de Abirdene' tenta In pretorio eisudem nono die
mensis Nouembris Anno et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day Duncan Wandy was conuikit In defalt of presens as he that
was warnit be the baillies

The said day thome findelaw pynour was conuict' be ane suorne assis'
Johnne of cullane forspekar for the trublance of ser Johnne ruthirfurd'
and till amend' as law will and forber in tyme to cum

Eodem die Johannes Raburne amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore Johannis
Cullane prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis horne Et idem Johannes
horne pro perturbio ipsius Johannis in verbo Et vtraque pars alterj emenabit
vt Jura volunt

The said day comperit Johnne' of cullan befor the baillies and exponit how
he had william Wellis akit in thar court buk for the pament of xl fidder
of petis And protestit solempnitlie sen' the tyme was that he mycht get na
pament of the said elding that quhat pris' that he boucht elding in defalt
of the said Williamis pament that he mycht recouir costis skathis and expensis
on' him to giddir with the principall some that he giffis for the said elding

Curia balliuorm bugi de abirdemne tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo die mensis
noumberis anno quo Supra

The saide day thir personis eftir writin of thar avne fre wile to the plesour
of the toune Consentit and grauntit to leue thir' Somes of money og
thar' avne purs to the Expens' of the commissaris chosin and passand' tile
our Souerane lordis parliament Set to be begunnyn the xxti day of
this Instant monetht of nouembir with continuacioun of dais quhilk money
salbe allouit to the said' personis in thar girssomes at the next asseda/
cioun' samoney of thame as happinnis ot haue takkis of the toune at
the said' next generale assedacioun' And' thai that happinnis to get nay
takkis of the toune salbe pait thankfullie of the girssomes of the saide
next assedacioun' quhilkis the aldirman and balyeis that happinnis to be for the
tyme sale caus' the said' personis that gettis nay takkis be thank
fullie pait of the said' money lent be thame In the first rassauit fra

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimotercio
die mensis Nouembris Anno Domini et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day the Prouost and bailyeis assignit friday that nixt cummis to patry
lesly to compeir befor thame and bring with him his assedacioun' and sic euidencis as he
has and will ha wse anent the croft occupeit be him clamit be James colison'
to pertene to him in heritag

The said day Duncan fif was maid quyt be ane suorn' assis' Johnne'
colisone' forspekar for the strublance of Dauid colp

The said day the balyeis assignit friday that nixt cummis to Dauid'
Duncan fif till ansuer at the Instance of Dauid colp for the strublance
done to him be the said Duncan

The said day thome bisset was conuict' be ane suorne' assis'
Johne' colisone forspekar for the strublance of Ormond' leslie sergeand'
in the execucion' of his office and the said ormond' quyt of all strublance
of the said thomas bisset and atour the said assis' ordand' that the said'
thomas suld' be expellit the tovne' for yeir and day for the said offence

The said day It was sufficientlie previt be diuers' famous personis
that the barkit hiddis extending to v pecis and half ane hid fundin In Johnne'
symmyris hous' quhen' the balyeis serseit' the towne' was thome bridyis and
pertenit to him quhilk hiddis the bailyeis deliuerit to the said thomas as his avin
propir gudis

The said day Johnne' andirsone cristofor prat and Androw litstar lauchfullie
callit warnit and nocht comperit ilkan of thame in amerciament of the court in defalt of
perance et cetera

The said day Androw burnat Skynner and' Duncan Wandy litstar
ilkan of thame' was in amerciament of the court be thar avin tounge
grant for occupacioun' of thar craftis and merchandice' and till amend' as
law will and forber' in tyme tocum et cetera

The said day Symon flescheour' Johnne' flescher' and thomas lammynton'
fleschearis was conuict' be ane suorne' assis' ser Johnne' ruthirfurde
forspekar for the occupacioun' of thar craft and marchandice for the
quhilkis ilkane of thame was in amerciament of the court and till amend'
as law will and forber in tyme tocum et cetera

The said day the baxtaris of the said burgh' all warnit comperit
and comperit except gilbert tulidef absent for breking of common'
ordinance in kepin of the pais' and for wanting of bred' to serue the
towne' et cetera was conuict' be ane suorne' assis' ser Johnne' ruthirfurd'
forspekar / for the quhilkis ilkane' of thame' was in amerciament of the court
for the contempcion' done agane the towne' and till amend' as law will
and forber in tyme tocum

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die nouembris
anno quo supra

The saide day Androw gordone Jonhne buchan and Alexander Donaldsone was conuict'
be ane assis sere Johne ruthirfurd' for brekin of pace in baking of quhet bred'

The saide day James broune was conuict be ane Suorne assis' sere Johne ruthirfurd'
forspeakar for the forstallin of the burghe in bying of wole and hidis et cetera Ande
malcum crag come souerte to the denis of gild' for the said James
vnlavis

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvij die nouembris
quo supra

The saide day William Wormet allegit that patry chernsid' has
Intromettit with tua barrellis of grils' and resauit tham fra William caldourhed' in banff
pertening to Jonhne lavsone in leitht quhilkis he askit in the nayme of the saide

The said day the Prouost bailyeis counsaill and communite of the said
bugh' representand' the haill body of the samyne warnit be the hand'
bell and circualie Inquerit ale in all ane voice concordand' Riplie
auisit for the auld' Rit and lovabile' consuetud' of the said burgh' vsit
and perseuerit all tymes bigane past memor of man' in the honor
of thar glorious patroun' Saint nicholace statut and ordanit that
all personis burges nichbouris and Inhabitaris burges sonnys habill
to Red to decor and honor the towne in thar array conveniant tharto sall
Rid' with Robert huyd' and litilejohne' quhilk was callit iij yeris bipast
Abbot and prior of Bonacord' one euiry Sanct Nicholas day throw
the towne as wse and wont has bene quhen' thai war warnit
be the' said Robert huyd litilejone or ony of thame' And'
gif ony man haffand takis of wattiris fischeingis landis of ony pensioun'
or proffit of the towne habile to Rid' beand warnit be the saidez'
Robert huyd or litilejohnne forsaid and' will nocht Ryd' be and' beis
conuikit tharintill be ane suorne assis' of the said burgh' sall tyne
thar takis pensionis and proffitis that thai haue of the said burgh' of salbe
secludit removit and vtirlie expellit fra ale takis pensionis proffitis
quhatsumeuir thai haue of the said burgh' in tyme tocum without ressonable'
caus' schawin and proponit to the prouost bailyeis counsaill Robene and
litlejohne obefor and be considerit be thame to be lauchfull Impediment
and excuis' quharthrou thai mycht nocht Rid' And' the personis havand'
na takis of the said burghe beand' warnit be the said robert hyud'
or litilejohnne' and will nocht rid' sall pay xxtj schillingis to Sanct
nicholace werk and viij s' to the bailyeis vnlaw vnforgevin

The saide day It was statut' ande ordanit be the prouest bailyeis and'
counsaile that ale the baxtaris of this burgh' sale haue redy bred' of quhet
to furnice and serue the tovne gude clene and' fresch' stuf weill bakin
the ij d' bred weyand' xxij vncez' and penny bred weyand' a xi vncez'
And bred clene wele boutit and and' fresch' stuf the ij d' laif wey/
and' xxxtj vncez' and the penny brede' weyand' xv vncez' And' euiry
baxtar of the saide burgh' sale warne thar offciar assignit to thaim
Intromet' quhen that bred is dravin out of the ovne to cum and wey
thar bred and' se that it keip the said pais' and' be Sufficient stuf
Ande gif the said baxtaris dravis thar bred one the nycht It stand' quhile
of the morne that thai may warne thar officairis And' gif ony of the
said baxtaris failyeis in ony pont befor writin and beis conuikit tharof
salbe secludit the craft for ane yer' and gif ony of the said' officiaris
being warnit obefor to pas' and' wey the said bred' and se gif It
kepis the pais' and' be suifficient stuf and failyeis tharintile And'
beis conuict' tharof salbe secludit thar office foreuir And' thir officiaris ar
assignit to the baxtaris vndir writin that is to say William scrimgeour to richerd'
redhed and thomas straloche baxtaris Normond' leslie officiar tile
alexander Donaldsone thomas buchan and thom' baxtar androw nachtj officiar'
to Donald' baxtar canny buchan and Johnne nicholsone hir sone Johne
cuk officiar' tile Androw gordoun and Androw Dvne baxtaris To the
obseruing and keping of the premiss' the said baxtaris consentit
and' grauntit and' the said' officiaris deponit the gret bodelie aitht

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio burgj de
Aberdene vicesimo die mensis Nouembris Anno quo supra

The said day Robert Waus grantit him awand' to patry
lesly eldar four barellis of salmond' quhilkis the bailyes
chargit him to pay within terme of lawAnd the said Robert
tuk to preyve this day viij dais iiij barellis of salmond'
pait to the aldirman

The said day Johnne' reid pardonare protestit that the tua schillingis
of annuell that he pait to ser Androw colisone mair than his chartir
expremit suld' turne him to na preiudicie and that he mycht haue remed'
of thame that aucht to freitht him

The said day adam fif tuk him to preif this day viij dais this
borgh' vnder folloving quhilk was denyit be Robert Waus I
adam fif burges of abirdene fundis ane borgh' in the handis
of androw nauchtie officiar of the said burgh' that wranguisly and
aganis the law robert Waus haldis fra me xvij s' of siluer
for xvij salt laxis the quhilk the said robert had fra me and promittit
to pay me the forsaid xij s' for the said fische and wrangis that he
do it nocht and tharto my borgh'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio Eiusdem xxo
quarto die mensis Noumebris Anno quo supra

The said day Duncan crak grantit tile ansuer to the borgh' fundin
one him be thomas leslie one monunday that nixt cumis for the
wranguis' withhaldin fra him of ane gold ring price v crovnis

The said day the aldirman baillies ande counsaile present for the tym
feit ande conducit robe crab sangstar for ane yer' to cum ande to gif
him alsmekle' fee as he had obefor and' to better gif he perse/
ueris in to goddis seruice

The said day george saidlar warnit at the Instance of Johnne summer
ande alexander sclatar at the Instance of William myllar was conuikit
in defalt of presence

The said day alexander Walcar protestit for his costis skathis and'
expensis maid and' Sustenit in the actioun debatable' betuix him
and Johnne grig
